text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..1Extension(4.0.1)Payment Details
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:type 0..1ExtensionPartial or complete payment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.type"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptPartial or complete payment
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-ex-paymenttype-for-R4 (example): The type (partial, complete) of the payment.
extension:adjustment 0..1ExtensionPayment adjustment for non-claim issues
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.adjustment"
value[x] 0..1MoneyPayment adjustment for non-claim issues
extension:adjustmentReason 0..1ExtensionExplanation for the variance
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.adjustmentReason"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptExplanation for the variance
Binding: http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/ValueSet/ValueSet-R5-payment-adjustment-reason-for-R4 (example): Payment Adjustment reason codes.
extension:date 0..1ExtensionExpected date of payment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.date"
value[x] 0..1dateExpected date of payment
extension:amount 0..1ExtensionPayable amount after adjustment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.amount"
value[x] 0..1MoneyPayable amount after adjustment
extension:identifier 0..1ExtensionBusiness identifier for the payment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.identifier"
value[x] 0..1IdentifierBusiness identifier for the payment
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ExplanationOfBenefit.payment"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension

Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionExplanationOfBenefit_Payment
title: Cross-version Extension `R5.ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source element is defined as:
`ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` 0..1 `BackboneElement`

Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as:
*  R5: `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` 0..1 `BackboneElement`
*  R4B: `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` 0..1 `BackboneElement`
*  R4: `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` 0..1 `BackboneElement`

Following are the generation technical comments:
Element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment`, but has no comparisons.

element.definition: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Whether this represents partial or complete payment of the benefits payable.
element.requirements:
To advise the requestor when the insurer believes all payments to have been completed. Element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.type`, but has no comparisons.

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions. element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

element.definition: Whether this represents partial or complete payment of the benefits payable.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

binding.description: The type (partial, complete) of the payment.

element.definition: Total amount of all adjustments to this payment included in this transaction which are not related to this claim's adjudication.
element.comment: Insurers will deduct amounts owing from the provider (adjustment), such as a prior overpayment, from the amount owing to the provider (benefits payable) when payment is made to the provider.
element.requirements:
To advise the requestor of adjustments applied to the payment. Element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.adjustment` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.adjustment` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ExplanationOfBenefit.payment.adjustment`, but has no comparisons.
